participant_abstract.sent: This meeting focussed on the concepts of the remote control, including components, properties, materials, user interface and response to trends.
Each team member presented their findings and gave reasons for their preferred design choices.
The meeting resulted in consensus on design specifications.

participant_actions.sent: ID - look and feel design - model.

participant_decisions.sent: Rubber case, curved on 1 side, hinged to flip open.
Push buttons for power, volume and channels on outside.
LCD display with spinning wheel on inside.
Sender and speaker if costs permit.
'fruit and vegetable' colours - orange, green, maybe red, yellow, purple.
Company colours can be incorporated in button design.
